timeline.message:
do not call createCache() for repositories without history for directories

it cannot create the cache anyway

timeline.author: tulinkry

replies.bodyText: depends on point of view I guess. Also, emojis are now the cool thing to have in (UTF-8 encoded) source code.
replies.author: vladak

timeline.bodyText: but what if it has history but for older revision?
timeline.author: tulinkry

replies.bodyText: That would fall through. However I think this is not the place to catch this.
replies.author: vladak

timeline.message:
be content with just history cache directory in ensureHistoryCacheExists()

fixes #3260

do not call createCache() for repositories without history for directories

it cannot create the cache anyway
